mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, create_time, update_time,subject) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{subject})
mapper.update: update clazz set name=#{name}, room=#{room}, begin_date=#{beginDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, master_id=#{masterId}, update_time=#{updateTime},subject=#{subject} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select c.*, e.name masterName from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and c.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by c.create_time desc
